guidelines.business_logic: Always use service classes for business logic
guidelines.object_creation: Use existing factories for object creation
guidelines.configuration: Use ConfigManager for all configuration access
guidelines.ui_integration: UI should only call service methods, no direct manipulation
guidelines.testing: Write tests for service layer, validate in demo

anti_patterns.direct_manipulation: Avoid direct object manipulation from UI
anti_patterns.business_logic_in_ui: No business logic in UI components
anti_patterns.bypassing_factories: Don't create objects without using factories
anti_patterns.missing_error_handling: Always include try/catch for service calls

quality_requirements.demo_integration: All features must work in demo.py
